author: Sam Sodomsky and Jazz Monroe
title: Lady Gaga Announces World Tour
text:
Lady Gaga Announces World Tour Following her airborne Super Bowl performance Lady Gaga Photo by Will Heath/NBC/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images 
Lady Gaga has followed her Super Bowl performance with the announcement of a huge world tour behind Joanne . Find the full itinerary here . It includes a run of North American shows in August and September, followed by dates across Europe and a final U.S. run taking her to the end of the year. 
Last year, she played three intimate shows as part of a “ dive bar tour ” preceding the album release. Revisit the Super Bowl performance below.
